name: e2e-batch-result-analysis
description: Analyze E2E batch dry run results: triage failures, write local analysis files, generate GitHub issue filing script. Use when batch_summary.json exists and you need structured output files (README, per-failure analysis, per-test issue bodies, shell script).
triggers: triage framework failures vs model failures
write analysis files locally before filing issues
generate issue filing script from batch results
tools_used: grep (extract error patterns from thread logs)
